attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament immediately and call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of Parliament have demonstrated by their actions, words and deeds that they do not represent the people of Great Britain any longer. Parliament must be dissolved immediately and a General Election called to allow the people a democratic voice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
